adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of the Spanish region of Asturias, its inhabitants, or the language spoken there.
examples: I did a wonderful walk along the Asturian coast

noun.description: The language of the Spanish region of Asturias.
examples: slogans translated into Spanish and Asturian

noun.description: A native or inhabitant of the Spanish region of Asturias.
examples: the Asturian had already shown his ability against Barcelona
